description: Only 15 at a time will be allowed up the tourist attraction, and they will have to wear masks.
title: Coronavirus: Italy's Tower of Pisa reopens after three months shut
title_page: Coronavirus: Italy's Tower of Pisa reopens after three months shut - BBC News
maintext: Tourists have to wear face masks and an electronic device which sends out signals and sounds if anyone gets within a metre of anyone else.
